alert.note: Alert for Craven; Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 8:03PM EDT until June 12 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jones County in eastern North Carolina... West central Craven County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 803 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tuscarora, or 15 miles west of New Bern, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Bern, River Bend, Tuscarora, Rhems, Pollocksville and Trenton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
